title: Clemson University
description: Clemson University's brand colors are part of its distinctive visual identity and include a palette that features vibrant shades. The primary color is Clemson Orange (#F56600), complemented by white (#FFFFFF) and a deep purple shade (#522D80). Additional supporting colors include Dark Gray (#333333) and a rich dark purple (#2E1A47). These colors reflect the university's spirited and bold character while maintaining a professional aesthetic. Details about these colors are accessible on Clemson's official brand guidelines website.
